description: BCPR preparatory Assistance for UNDP Iraq

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
1.	Through gender analysis: Strategies and interventions are guided by an understanding of the situation of women and girls, boys and men.
2.	Enhance knowledge creation and learning on the 8PA, Res 1325 and 1820 in the CO and Iraq.
3.	Strengthen the capacities of staff to integrate GBV prevention and response into programming
4.	Strengthen technical and programmatic capacities of UNDP CO to operationalize the 8PA and implement UN Res. 1325 and 1820.
5.	Support and encourage the implementation of programmes that enhance Gender Equality and Women’s Empowerment in Iraq validated by national stakeholders, partners and government.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: BCPR preparatory Assistance fo
